name: BAMF!: Environmental Hazard
description:
Environmental Hazard! This newest update includes a 4-map expansion pack to the game. Featuring no turrets, Environmental Hazard will challenge your ability to teleport under pressure in 3 difficult new levels.

Also included is new music, new background art and a sandbox training ground map to hone your skills.

Developed by @JoeParlock

Press M to toggle mute, press refresh to leave Environmental Hazard.

Credits

Music: FreeJazz Medley by Sauer2

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo

http://www.matthewpablo.com

You are free to make and monetise videos of this game through ad revenue, Patreon, or however else you make money from your content.
